alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 7:31PM EDT until June 04 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Highlands County in south central Florida... Hardee County in central Florida... Southwestern Polk County in central Florida... North central DeSoto County in south central Florida... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 731 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Bartow to near Wauchula to Ona, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sweetwater, Avon Park, Fort Meade, Wauchula, Bowling Green, Zolfo Springs, Ona, Avon Park Executive Airport, Gardner, and Crewsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
